list.name: Default Changelist
list.comment: Adjust error message display for showNumeric and showShort/Long

task.summary: Default task
update question IDs and update questions in question-uploader.js
start on validation in showNumeric and removed extra question in question-uploader.js

create repromptQuestion function.
changed addMessage to not have validation and used disableTextInput.
IncrementQuestion is combined into NextQuestion function.
Changes by Yong Peng
Changes made by Kelvin
remove unnecessary console.log lines and try to fix message being only one 1 side of the chat interface
fix chatbot UI
fix mainpage's colour inconsistencies
fix chatbot bugs

temporarily added a new file for Kelvin to easily host the website locally. will be removed at end of PI.
fixed spelling mistake on main page and first time survey js.
added a terms and conditions html page.

incorparated terms and conditions page with main page.
Terms and Conditions page now requires user to tick checkbox to proceed to chatbot. (updating user's data on firebase whether they have accepted it or not is still NOT DONE)
add linkert scale design

Completed Terms and Conditions Page. Now main page can check if the user already accepted the terms and conditions. Terms and Conditions page now update user's data in realtime database with their acceptance of the terms and conditions.

Created Terms of Use page for user registration step and empty contents of Terms and conditions page in preparation of terms and conditions from the clients.
TODO: Get info of which pages the terms of use page will go to if back button is clicked. Also, work with Vlad to put in the Terms of Use page for user registration.
The terms of Use files will be deleted because i will pass them to Vlad and his team to plug it in to make the merge easier.
Completed terms and conditions page (last "terms and conditions" page was the terms of use page)

Update question uploader questions and place some TODO to mark questions that needs to be deleted and have their numbers updated (section 1 is done by Kelvin while section 2,3,4 and 5 is done by Daniel)
updated the questions for part 1. (this includes the removal of the old qs 1.10 and 1.11 from V3 of the questionnaire and updating the number of the questions after the removal)
added question 4.5 into the question uploader and corrected qs 4.3's rating number range.
merge with last commit
Fixed chatbot questions uploader and finalised the updated questions. fixed if statement in chatbot-init.js. updated constants.js with current questions' ids

Update the terms of use page with the feature to update it's elements according to the selected language. (need to get proper translation of the elements from the clients)
Created uploaders for the terms of use chinese and malay translation. (still awaiting the thai translation - if thai is selected, the terms of use defaults to english)
implemented language switch for the page based on the selected language
commented Kelvin-login script from termsOfUsePage.html
remove translation based TODOs and fixed the wording of Qs 4.5. Created empty templates for the question uploaders for the other supported languages.

Implemented a language switching system based on LANGUAGE variable stored in local storage. uploaded english version translation onto firebase english question branch added new constants to help in the language switching system. Renamed question-uploader.js to question-uploader_en.js. change name of the uploadQuestion() and housekeeping() functions in the question uploader files to specify the language of the questions they are uploading.
updated the language uploader templates changed question 4.4 to a long text question And the chinese uploader questions are in place. (left to add in the chinese translation of the answer options)
update Question 1_12 hints for all question uploaders

Changed Qs1.3 to a multipleChoiceOthers type question added the chinese translation for the chinese questions' answer options. Updated constants.js with new English questions IDs and chinese question IDs

Corrected the question type for Qs 1.3, 1.7 and 2.1 for all question uploader. ensured the hint format, wording and answers are consistent accross the malay, english and chinese uploaders. Completed malay language question uploader. Updated the question ids for english, malay and chinese questions.

implemented short explanatory statement in the terms and conditions page which contains a link to the long version of the explanatory statement. Created a page for the long version of the explanatory statement and refactored the old termsAndCondtions_en_Uploader to termsAndConditions_en_long_Uploader.js Created termsAndConditions_en_short_Uploader.js Now users will always see the terms and conditions page.

integrate the lastest version of the translation.js and main_page.html into our branch to test translation functions.
added some "notranslate" into some of the html element's classes to get it ready for auto translate function.
changed first_time_survey.js's language strings to accomodate the new language string chosen by team redcow
removed kelvin-login.js script tag from our html files
fixed name of explanatory statement html files (inititally was "Explanatory storage"). Created css for explnanatory statement html pages to better fit html elements for mobile phone view.
fixed click MCQ option to select it. added back select() function is added back into onclick part of mcqOption string in showOption() function.

MCQ responses are now stored as the chosen option's index in question object's restriction's choices.
added option to use "others" option for MCQs. This is includes storage of the text response with the index of the "others" option in question object's restriction's choices as a sting string.
Adjust resumeSurvey for the new way of storage of MCQ inputs.
fixed issue with showNumric() allowing non numbers to be taken as inputs
fixed text box input for MCQs and implemented feature to allow chatbot to accept MCQ option's word itself and MCQ option number + MCQ option's word itself as input.
fixed problem when showing numeric subquestions and now text inputs for numeric questions are now stored as numbers in the firebase rather than as a string.
Fixed bug with resume function for sub questions. Now the code saves the response first before calling next question.
Added skip logic for question 1.8 for english questions. updated english question IDs and changed first time survey's addMessage() to handle skip logic for numeric questions.

Added skip logic for question 1.8 for malay, chinese and thai questions. updated malay, chinese and thai question IDs and changed first time survey's addMessage() to handle skip logic for numeric questions.
moved question_branch constant to questions_responses.js because that is the only file that uses it.

Change the name of functions "checkChoiceInput" and "checkChoiceInputOthers" to "checkMCQInput" and "checkMCQInputOthers" respectively. Added documentation to these function and changed the error message to instruct user on what is a valid input.
Adjust error message display for showNumeric and showShort/Long Text functions.
Adjust error message display for showNumeric and showShort/Long
fixed bug with google translate on questions and answer bubble. Fixed bug: restart and resume feature does not work for translated version of chatbot.

Added uploader files for translations for the explanatory statement short and long versions for Thai, Malay and Chinese.
Adjusted Explanatory statement and explanatory statement long js and html file to switch between translatations based on selected languages.

Updated hints for numeric questions, reupload questions onto firebase and update question IDs and updated closing message to the one given by clients in 30/9/21 meeting.
Added continue function if users did not answer future research question.

MESSAGE.value: Implemented a language switching system based on LANGUAGE variable stored in local storage. uploaded english version translation onto firebase english question branch added new constants to help in the language switching system. Renamed question-uploader.js to question-uploader_en.js. change name of the uploadQuestion() and housekeeping() functions in the question uploader files to specify the language of the questions they are uploading.
updated the language uploader templates changed question 4.4 to a long text question And the chinese uploader questions are in place. (left to add in the chinese translation of the answer options)
update Question 1_12 hints for all question uploaders

Changed Qs1.3 to a multipleChoiceOthers type question added the chinese translation for the chinese questions' answer options. Updated constants.js with new English questions IDs and chinese question IDs

Corrected the question type for Qs 1.3, 1.7 and 2.1 for all question uploader. ensured the hint format, wording and answers are consistent accross the malay, english and chinese uploaders. Completed malay language question uploader. Updated the question ids for english, malay and chinese questions.

implemented short explanatory statement in the terms and conditions page which contains a link to the long version of the explanatory statement. Created a page for the long version of the explanatory statement and refactored the old termsAndCondtions_en_Uploader to termsAndConditions_en_long_Uploader.js Created termsAndConditions_en_short_Uploader.js Now users will always see the terms and conditions page.

fixed click MCQ option to select it. added back select() function is added back into onclick part of mcqOption string in showOption() function.

MCQ responses are now stored as the chosen option's index in question object's restriction's choices.
added option to use "others" option for MCQs. This is includes storage of the text response with the index of the "others" option in question object's restriction's choices as a sting string.

fixed issue with showNumric() allowing non numbers to be taken as inputs
fixed text box input for MCQs and implemented feature to allow chatbot to accept MCQ option's word itself and MCQ option number + MCQ option's word itself as input.
fixed problem when showing numeric subquestions and now text inputs for numeric questions are now stored as numbers in the firebase rather than as a string.
Fixed bug with resume function for sub questions. Now the code saves the response first before calling next question.
Added skip logic for question 1.8 for english questions. updated english question IDs and changed first time survey's addMessage() to handle skip logic for numeric questions.

Added skip logic for question 1.8 for malay, chinese and thai questions. updated malay, chinese and thai question IDs and changed first time survey's addMessage() to handle skip logic for numeric questions.
moved question_branch constant to questions_responses.js because that is the only file that uses it.

Change the name of functions "checkChoiceInput" and "checkChoiceInputOthers" to "checkMCQInput" and "checkMCQInputOthers" respectively. Added documentation to these function and changed the error message to instruct user on what is a valid input.
Adjust error message display for showNumeric and showShort/Long Text functions.

fixed bug with google translate on questions and answer bubble. Fixed bug: restart and resume feature does not work for translated version of chatbot.

Added uploader files for translations for the explanatory statement short and long versions for Thai, Malay and Chinese.
Adjusted Explanatory statement and explanatory statement long js and html file to switch between translatations based on selected languages.

Updated hints for numeric questions, reupload questions onto firebase and update question IDs and updated closing message to the one given by clients in 30/9/21 meeting.
